data.caption: Clarification sought from Moschip Technologies Ltd
data.news_body:
The Exchange has sought clarification from Moschip Technologies Ltd on September 5 2025 with reference to significant movement in price in order to ensure that investors have latest relevant information about the company and to inform the market so that the interest of the investors is safeguarded.

The reply is awaited.
